name: Grudge of Gregorius
description:
A MYTHICAL OPEN WORLD WITH MUSICAL COMBAT!

In this game you play as a Necromancer who is out to teach the Gods a little lesson, motivated purely by spite. After a brutal battle that he lost, the Necromancer’s magical instruments were sealed away by the Gods, and it is up to the player to wander the world and find all 3 of them, fighting monsters along the way and slowly learning the Necromancer’s story. The player will hone their skills, fighting monsters by raising corpses with music, to be strong enough to get revenge on the Gods.

XBOX Controllers are supported

This game was created by a group of 24 students in the duration of only 8 weeks! For more information about us and the game visit:  grudgeofgregorius.com
